articles.title: US experts convene to decide whether to OK Pfizer vaccine - Minneapolis Star Tribune
articles.description: A U.S. government advisory panel endorsed widespread use of Pfizer's coronavirus vaccine Thursday, putting the country just one step away from launching an epic vaccination campaign against the outbreak that has killed close to 300,000 Americans.

articles.description: Recently diagnosed cancer patients are more vulnerable to Covid-19 infection and face more severe illness, a risk higher for Black people.
